Firewyrms live in tubes of molten lava found throughout the [Plane of Fire](/Planes.aspx?ID=31). These strange environments often connect to volcanoes on mortal worlds, giving firewyrms access to a wide variety of prey. **[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 26 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 [Firewyrm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2983) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 144 1.1 **Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), smoke vision **Languages** [Pyric](/Languages.aspx?ID=110) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +20 **Str** +5 **Dex** +5 **Con** +4 **Int** -1 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +0 **Smoke Vision** The firewyrm ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) condition from smoke. --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +20 **Will** +15 **HP** 165 (explosion) **Immunities** bleed, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696) **Weaknesses** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) 10, [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=732) 10 **Explosion** ([fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604)) When the firewyrm dies, it explodes, dealing 6d6 fire damage to each creature in a 10-foot emanation (DC 28 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).
[Intense Heat](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=53)(aura, fire) 10 feet, 4d6 fire, DC 25 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex --- **Speed** 60 feet **Melee** tail +20 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+11 fire plus 2d8 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Ranged** fire mote +20 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d8+6 fire **Breathe Fire** ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The firewyrm breathes a 30-foot cone of fire dealing 7d6 fire and 2d8 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) to every creature within the cone (DC 28 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The firewyrm can't Breathe Fire again for 1d4 rounds.
